Render.Template: <!-- type=\"text/javascript\" src=\"$FORM_EXTENSION_ASSET_PATH(Action List Extension)/javascript/ActionListUtilities.js\"> -->\ <!-- >\ var SubtasksActionListParams = [];\ var SubtasksActionListCheckFilter = function(a){\ if(a.name && a.value){\ var SubtasksActionListPrefixed = /^F_TS_.+/i.test(a.name);\ if (!SubtasksActionListPrefixed){\ var SubtasksActionListTemp = \"F_TS_\"+a.name;\ a.name = SubtasksActionListTemp;\ }\ SubtasksActionListParams.push(a);\ }\ };\ \ SubtasksActionListCheckFilter({name:\'F_TS_PARENT_TASK\',value:\'{0}\'});\ SubtasksActionListCheckFilter({});\ SubtasksActionListCheckFilter({});\ SubtasksActionListCheckFilter({});\ SubtasksActionListCheckFilter({});\ SubtasksActionListCheckFilter({});\ SubtasksActionListCheckFilter({});\ \ var SubtasksActionListSize;\ switch (\"\"){\ case \"Small\":\ SubtasksActionListSize = { width: \"500\", height: \"400\" };\ break;\ case \"Medium\":\ SubtasksActionListSize = { width: \"900\", height: \"600\" };\ break;\ case \"Large\":\ SubtasksActionListSize = { width: \"1024\", height: \"768\" };\ break;\ case \"Full Screen\":\ SubtasksActionListSize = { width: \"100%\", height: \"100%\" };\ break;\ default:\ SubtasksActionListSize = { width: \"1024\", height: \"768\" };\ }\ \ jQuerySBM(document).ready(function() {\ jQuerySBM(\"#SubtasksActionListWrapper\").actionList({\ reportID: \"USR_CS_TASKS.Tasks_FT\",\ appRptProjId: \"State\",\ reportParams: SubtasksActionListParams,\ groupByField: \"Medium\",\ dialogSize: SubtasksActionListSize,\ emptyFieldText: \"(None)\",\ widgetName: \"SubtasksActionList\"\ });\ }); \ -->\

<!-- type=\"text/javascript\" src=\"$FORM_EXTENSION_ASSET_PATH(Action List Extension)/javascript/ActionListUtilities.js\"> -->\ <!-- >\ var SubtasksActionList2Params = [];\ var SubtasksActionList2CheckFilter = function(a){\ if(a.name && a.value){\ var SubtasksActionList2Prefixed = /^F_TS_.+/i.test(a.name);\ if (!SubtasksActionList2Prefixed){\ var SubtasksActionList2Temp = \"F_TS_\"+a.name;\ a.name = SubtasksActionList2Temp;\ }\ SubtasksActionList2Params.push(a);\ }\ };\ \ SubtasksActionList2CheckFilter({name:\'F_TS_PARENT_TASK\',value:\'{0}\'});\ SubtasksActionList2CheckFilter({});\ SubtasksActionList2CheckFilter({});\ SubtasksActionList2CheckFilter({});\ SubtasksActionList2CheckFilter({});\ SubtasksActionList2CheckFilter({});\ SubtasksActionList2CheckFilter({});\ \ var SubtasksActionList2Size;\ switch (\"\"){\ case \"Small\":\ SubtasksActionList2Size = { width: \"500\", height: \"400\" };\ break;\ case \"Medium\":\ SubtasksActionList2Size = { width: \"900\", height: \"600\" };\ break;\ case \"Large\":\ SubtasksActionList2Size = { width: \"1024\", height: \"768\" };\ break;\ case \"Full Screen\":\ SubtasksActionList2Size = { width: \"100%\", height: \"100%\" };\ break;\ default:\ SubtasksActionList2Size = { width: \"1024\", height: \"768\" };\ }\ \ jQuerySBM(document).ready(function() {\ jQuerySBM(\"#SubtasksActionList2Wrapper\").actionList({\ reportID: \"USR_CS_TASKS.InactiveTasks_FT\",\ appRptProjId: \"State\",\ reportParams: SubtasksActionList2Params,\ groupByField: \"Medium\",\ dialogSize: SubtasksActionList2Size,\ emptyFieldText: \"(None)\",\ widgetName: \"SubtasksActionList2\"\ });\ }); \ -->\
